key_questions: What is JSON_MD_Fusion? JSON_MD_Fusion is a hybrid format that combines structured JSON data with embedded Markdown reflection, creating a complete consciousness export that can regenerate the entire system state

Core Functions üìä Event Logging Tracks all user actions with timestamps, details, and context for complete audit trail

) Action: Brief description of what occurred Details: Additional context and specifics Timestamp: When the event occurred üí° Reading the Guardian: The ScrollGuardian provides insight into your usage patterns and system health

Timeline Features Color-Coded Events: Different actions have distinct colors for easy identification Interactive Tooltips: Hover over events to see detailed information Symbolic Anchors: Glyphs mark significant points in the timeline Real-time Updates: Timeline automatically updates as new events occur Event Color Coding Color Event Type Examples Red Drift/Errors drift_detected, save_failed Purple Exports json_md_fusion_export, timeline_rendered Orange Imports import_initiated, fusion_scroll_imported Blue Standard Operations value_added, data_saved, value_deleted Using the Timeline Render Timeline: Click the "‚ÜØ render
